definition[0]: the time between about 9:00 in the morning and 5:00 in the afternoon, when people in offices are working
example[0]: Can you phone again during office hours?
definition[1]: the time during the day or week when students can meet with their teacher in the teacher’s office
example[1]: Professor Lee’s office hours are from two to four on Mondays and Thursdays.
definition[2]: the time between about 9:00 in the morning and 6:00 in the afternoon, when people in offices are working
example[2]: No one is allowed in the building outside office hours.
